page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content:
MY FAVOURITE SUBJECT BY BEVERLEY. MY FAVOURITE SUBJECT IS MUSIC.I PLAY FOUR INSTRUMENTS ALTOGETHER.I LEARN THREE OF THEM AT SCHOOL.I PLAY THE VIOLIN.IT HAS 4 STRINGS AND A BOW.I PLAY THE GUITAR.IT HAS 6 STRINGS.I ALSO PLAY THE RECORDER.I HAVE A GUITAR LESSON ON A MONDAY,AND VIOLIN AND RECORDER ON A WEDNESDAY.I ALSO PLAY THE PIANO BUT I DO NOT LEARN IT AT SCHOOL. I SOMETIMES PLAY INSTRUMENTS IN CONCERTS AND SCHOOL PRODUCTIONS.
THESE ARE SOME OF MY FAVOURITE TUNES I HAVE PLAYED IN 1985 PIANO FROHLICHER LANDMANN VIOLIN SLUMBER SONG RECORDER SLEEPING BEAUTY WALTZ GUITAR HOME ON THE RANGE
